discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Entitlements are counted on a per unit basis. The Unit field on the Service Entitlement form defines the unit type, either cases or hours.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-csm-entitlements.html

Answer: D. Hours and cases

Explanation: "Entitlements are counted on a per unit basis. The Unit field on the Service Entitlement form defines the unit type, either cases or hours.", note it says cases or hours soooo ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-csm-entitlements.html

Selected Answer: D
D is Correct

Capture the install base for a customer by creating sold products, install base items, and installed products to enable customer service agents to easily trace issues back to the right product, instances of that product, and other entities that might impact their functioning.

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-install-base.html

Selected Answer: ABD
ABD is Correct.

choices.D: The data copied over to the Work Order form when creating a work order from a case cannot be configured or customized
choices.C: When creating a work order from a case only the Account field on the work order form is filed in but not the Company field
choices.B: Updates on a case or work order will only synchronize after the work order is approved
choices.A: If information changes on the Case form it is not updated on the Work Order form

questions.question_text: What is a limitation regarding synchronization between a case and its associated work order?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Known limitations
There is no synchronization between the Work Order form and the associated Case form. If information changes on the Case form, it does not get updated on the Work Order form.

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-field-service-management/page/product/field-service-management/concept/customer-service-integration.html

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

There is no synchronization between the Work Order form and the associated Case form. If information changes on the Case form, it does not get updated on the Work Order form.

Selected Answer: CDE
Users with the customer service agent role can propose an existing customer service case as a major case candidate.

Before you begin

Role required: sn_customerservice_agent, sn_customerservice.consumer_agent, sn_customerservice_manager, sn_majorissue_mgt.major_issue_manager

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/propose-major-case-candidate.html

Selected Answer: CDE
Answer:
 C. Customer service manager (sn_customerservice_manager)
 D. Customer service agent (sn_customerservice_agent)
 E. Major issue manager (sn_majorissue_mgt.major_issue_manager)

Explanation:
Roles required are:
 - sn_customerservice_agent (d.)
 - sn_customerservice.consumer_agent 
 - sn_customerservice_manager (c.)
 - sn_majorissue_mgt.major_issue_manager (e.)

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/propose-major-case-candidate.htm

Selected Answer: CDE
CDE is Correct
sn_customerservice_agent, sn_customerservice.consumer_agent, sn_customerservice_manager, sn_majorissue_mgt.major_issue_manager
